author: ArieHein
body: As I couldn't find documentation, have you thought about removing the dependency of PSWA on IIS and .NET and instead base it on Kestrel and .NET Core  (or Node.js) ?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Good suggestion, however PowWa is outside the scope of PowerShell Core (not owned by this team).

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Any plans to put PSWA on GitHub?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: There are currently no plans to OSS PowerShell Web Access.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: So we can close the Issue.

title: PowerShell Web Access based on kestrel
